text: "Here I Am Again" is a 1972 song by country singer Loretta Lynn and written by Shel Silverstein. It is the title track to her 21st studio album Here I Am Again and went to number 3 on both the United States and Canadian country charts. == Track listings == 7" vinyl single * "Here I Am Again" – 2:44 * "My Kind of Man" – 1:50 ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Country songs Category:Loretta Lynn songs
title: Here I Am Again (song)
